title: Whats the funniest insult/salt/toxic rage you have seen in league?

replies.body: Yesterday my jungle tf reported me  for feeding because i lost lane to a yasuo. Granted that match wasn't my best, but i did ping when ever yasuo went missing and try to help when ever i can. This little shit friended me and bitched and moaned about how bad i was when he was like 2/7 when the match ended.

My team and I were discussing how annoying LeBlanc is and the Elise Jungle started arguing with us about how she thinks LeBlanc is out of meta and is so weak. Then we started to laugh (nothing more) and she just started assisting the enemy team (straight up walking away from fights, refusing to group for dragon, dying then /ff)
People nowadays just tend to spout words without meaning and I hate it so much.
Thats what I was thinking for the rest of the match. I was like "how.... what do you think it is????"
